content: c1 mantis c2 pattern notes kitten c3 atomic c4 and hyperchick c5 ws wrong side with mho mho in color hyperchick piece is worked using 1 strand of mho mho held together with 1 strand of tod through- five color pink sample shown in colors out when you reach the end of each stripe tod in colors florange c1 betty c2 section you will cut the current color of tod atomic c3 pop rocks c4 and taffy c5 leaving a tail to weave in later there is no with mho mho in color taffy need to cut mho mho as the same color is held continuously throughout abbreviations special stitches directions for two color version shawl body pattern row 1 rs k3 sm m1l knit to m m1r sm k1 sm m1l using 1 strand of tod in mc and 1 strand of mho mho and gauge needle co 7 sts knit to m m1r sm k3 4 sts increase d row 2 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts slipping markers as you come to them k3 set up row row 1 ws k3 pm p1 pm k3 row 2 rs k3 sm m1l pm k1 pm m1r sm k3 2 sts increase d ribbed edge pattern 9 sts row 1 rs k3 sm *k3 p2 repeat from * to last 3 sts sm k3 row 3 ws k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers as you come row 2 ws k3 sm *k2 p3 repeat from * to last 3 sts sm k3 to them k3 begin pattern stripe section with mc continuing with colors used in set up work shawl body pattern row 1&2 6 times total 12 row completed 24 sts increase d 33 sts on needles cut tod mc stripe section with cc changing to tod cc and continuing with mho mho held together work shawl body pattern row 1&2 8 times total 16 row complet- ed 32 sts increase d 65 sts on the needles cut tod cc stripe section with mc changing to tod mc
